Package org.takes.rq

Requests.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RqCookies
    HTTP cookies parsing.
    RqForm
    Request decorator that decodes FORM data from application/x-www-form-urlencoded format (RFC 1738).
    RqHeaders
    HTTP headers parsing

    RqHref
    HTTP URI query parsing.
    RqMethod
    HTTP method parsing.
    RqMultipart
    HTTP multipart FORM data decoding.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RqCookies.Base
    Request decorator, for HTTP cookies parsing.
    RqFake
    Fake request (for unit tests).
    RqForm.Base
    Base implementation of @link RqForm.
    RqForm.Smart
    Smart decorator, with extra features.
    RqGreedy
    Request decorator, for HTTP request caching.
    RqHeaders.Base
    Request decorator, for HTTP headers parsing.
    RqHeaders.Smart
    Smart decorator, with extra features.
    RqHref.Base
    Request decorator, for HTTP URI query parsing.
    RqHref.Smart
    Smart decorator, with extra features.
    RqLengthAware
    Request decorator that limits its body, according to the Content-Length header in its head.
    RqLive
    Live request.
    RqMethod.Base
    Request decorator, for HTTP method parsing.
    RqMultipart.Base
    Request decorator, that decodes FORM data from multipart/form-data format (RFC 2045).
    RqMultipart.Smart
    Smart decorator.
    RqPrint
    Request decorator, to print it all.
    RqWithHeader
    Request with extra header.
    RqWithoutHeader
    Request without a header (even if it was absent).
    RqWrap
    Request wrap.

Requests.
